scripts.dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "CLIENT,SERVER" -c "bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold" "manypkg run client dev" "manypkg run server dev"
scripts.clean: yarn manypkg exec rm -rf node_modules && manypkg exec rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.lint: yarn manypkg run server lint && yarn manypkg run vl-shared lint && manypkg run client lint
scripts.lint:check: yarn manypkg run server lint:check && yarn manypkg run vl-shared lint:check && manypkg run client lint:check
